title: Now that the Round About at Middle Sound is finished I was wondering where the old Middle Sound sign is?  They took it down when they were first starting the Round About.  Do you know if there is a plan to put it back up?  Also, will landscaping be permitted in the center of the Round About?
text:
I believe this recent post to MyReporter.com will help you find your
answer.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7686
